actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the transportation of motor vehicles owned by Federal employees on Johnson Island to their families in Hawaii.

summary.text: Authorizes the transportation at Government expense of motor vehicles owned by any Federal employee to Hawaii if the employee's place of duty is Johnston Island and the employee's immediate family will reside in Hawaii. Authorizes further transport of vehicles from Hawaii following completion of duties on Johnston Island.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the transportation of motor vehicles owned by Federal employees on Johnson Island to their families in Hawaii.
